requirements.value: This version of the profile requires at least one identifier.

Enables a formal definition of how he task is to be performed (e.g. using BPMN, BPEL, XPDL or other formal notation) to be associated with a task, enabling automation. This version of the profile requires at least one definition.
This version of the profile requires a code.
This version of the profile requires a description.
Most often used along with lastUpdated to track duration of task to supporting monitoring and management. This version of the profile requires an authoredOn.
Used along with history to track task activity and time in a particular task state. This enables monitoring and management. This version of the profile requires a lastModified.
Identifies who created this task. May be used by access control mechanisms (e.g., to ensure that only the creator can cancel a task). This version of the profile requires a requester.
Identifies who is expected to perform this task. This version of the profile requires an owner.
